Based on the President's 2016 proclamation of reading, we have directed the conversion of the national day "Early Emirates" to celebrate reading supporters https://t.co/e79seLWd22

On the 45th National Day, we will celebrate the 45 best personalities and destinations that contributed to the year of reading as the best governmental initiative, the best media, the best teacher, the best student and the best library.
880 initiative, federal, local and media project in the year of reading .. deserve support, honor and celebration in our best national days - December 2nd

We will also be the best mother in the UAE who has encouraged her children to read, and the best father has established a distinguished home library for his children .. They are the first UAE this year

The reader community is a civilized society, it supports reading and supports the industry of civilization, supports the knowledge economy, and supports the building of generations to embrace the future of the UAE

Today starts the Paralympic Games # Rio2016. I am very proud of the support my government gave the athletes.
The Brazilian Paralympic athletes also had the incentive of the Plano Brasil Medals and the Bolsa Podium.
They are among the best in the world and are an example of overcoming, tenacity, dedication and willpower.
Brazilian Paralympic athletes perform fantastically. # Paralympic Medals.
My government is proud to have set up the Brazilian Paralympic Center, one of the most modern in the world in São Paulo.
Our athletes trained at the Center. They will bring many medals and joy to the Brazilian people. I'm cheering. #Paralympic Victory
